W1 Device

To run the Hipi Control GUI

gksudo hipi-control-gui




This panel simply displays a list of the currently registered devices on the One Wire kernel driver.

Check or uncheck the W1 Kernel Modules Loaded checkbox to load and unload the kernel drivers. To permanently skip or load the device drivers at system startup see Loading Device Drivers.

See Also :

Loading Device Drivers
